user_story.as_a: Product Owner understanding the value of user acceptance criterias written with cucumber
user_story.i_want: have a simple read access to the latest version of cucumber features for my application (available on /features)
user_story.so_that: discuss the features of the application with the developpers

givens_list: I enter the address of the features page, e.g. http://staging.myfantasticapp.com/features
thens_list: I should see the source code of the first feature of my application
